name: Michael Jackson
description: Michael Jackson was an American singer, songwriter, and dancer. He is regarded as one of the greatest entertainers of all time. Jackson was born in Gary, Indiana, and began his career as a member of the Jackson 5 in the late 1960s. He went on to release 10 solo studio albums, all of which were commercially successful. Jackson's most famous albums include Off the Wall (1979), Thriller (1982), and Bad (1987). Thriller is the best-selling album of all time, with over 66 million copies sold worldwide. Jackson died in 2009 at the age of 50.
label: Epic Records
radio_episode_list: Michael Jackson: The King of Pop
Michael Jackson: The Life and Times
